fields.name: image
fields.label: Card Image
fields.description: This is the image that shows in the list view of articles. (If using a IIIF image URL, make sure to limit the width to 1200px.)

fields.name: backgroundImage
fields.label: Background Image
fields.description: This is the image that shows on the article page at the top. (If using a IIIF image, make sure to limit the width to 1200px.)

fields.name: tags
fields.label: Tags
fields.description: To see other article tags, visit: https://www.leventhalmap.org/tags/

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
